Hi Shroo and TPTB,

I have a problem with setup.bat. It skips files when installing. This leads to the game loading up to the menu screen but with no sound and a new game cannot be launched. I'm on Windows 7 x64 and UAC and my antivirus are deactivated.

Hi Shroo and TPTB,

I have a problem with setup.bat When setup.bat is installing it skips installing files and consequently when I try and run the game it gets to the main title screen but there is no sound and a new game won't load.

Update:

I unpacked the .zip file with WinRAR instead of 7zip. Unpacking with 7zip unpacks the files properly and the setup.bat works properly installing all the files.

Game then runs fine.

P.s. I also find watching the setup.bat percentage increase intently and begging it to work properly also might help :-)

Game installs fine. Good quality, works, no viruses etc. Dx11 tries to access the net according to zonealarm, but I denied it cause seriously, dx doesn't need internet access. To the guy asking where it uninstalls, just delete it from wherever you unpacked it to. Mine is in my downloads folder for example. It's real easy. If all else fails, go to properties on your shortcut and check where the target it. That will show you the game location. And thank you TPTB. First download I've gotten from you guys.
